headline: Dow and Innventure to Collaborate on Waste-to-Value Platform
summary: Innventure founds fourth company, Refinity, to commercialize cost-effective conversion of mixed wastes to petrochemical feedstocksMIDLAND, Mich. and ORLANDO, Fla., Dec. 18, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dow (NYSE: DOW) and Innventure (NASDAQ: INV), a technology commercialization platform, today announced plans to collaborate to develop and commercialize new waste-to-value technologies. The collaboration aims to enable globally scalable, cost-effective conversion of mixed wastes to petrochemical feeds

The collaboration aims to enable globally scalable, cost-effective conversion of mixed wastes to petrochemical feeds

headline: Dow achieves 24th year on the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index
summary: Dow (NYSE: DOW) announced today that it has been named to the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index (DJSI World) by S&P Dow Jones Indices. This is the 24th year Dow has achieved this prestigious ranking as one of the top companies in the global chemical industry in terms of sustainability performance. Dow is also listed on the Dow Jones Sustainability North America Index (DJSI North America) for the 19th consecutive year.
